00020 template <class Tclass, class Treturn>
00021 class MFunctor0 : public Functor0<Treturn>
00022 {
00023 public:
00024 
00026         MFunctor0(Tclass* obj, Treturn(Tclass::*_fun)()):
00027           m_pObj(obj), m_pFun(_fun)
00028         {
00029         } // Constructor.
00030 
00032         Treturn Call()
00033         {
00034                 return (*m_pObj.*m_pFun)();
00035         } // Call
00036 
00037 protected:
00038         Tclass* m_pObj;                                 
00039         Treturn(Tclass::*m_pFun)();             
00041 }; // MFunctor0
00042

00045 //------------------------------------------
00046 template <class Tclass, class Treturn>
00047 MFunctor0<Tclass, Treturn>* mem_fun     ( Tclass *obj, Treturn(Tclass::*_fun)() ) 
00048 {
00049         MFunctor0<Tclass, Treturn>* zFunc = new MFunctor0<Tclass, Treturn>(obj,_fun);
00050         return zFunc;
00051 
00052 } // MFunctor0 mem_fun
